error.message: Automatic migration was not applied because it would result in data loss. Set AutomaticMigrationDataLossAllowed to 'true' on your DbMigrationsConfiguration to allow application of automatic migrations even if they might cause data loss. Alternately, use Update-Database with the '-Force' option, or scaffold an explicit migration.
error.detail:
Microsoft.Practices.Unity.ResolutionFailedException: Resolution of the dependency failed, type = "BeYourMarket.Service.DataCacheService", name = "(none)". Exception occurred while: Calling constructor BeYourMarket.Service.DataCacheService(Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer container). Exception is: AutomaticDataLossException - Automatic migration was not applied because it would result in data loss. Set AutomaticMigrationDataLossAllowed to 'true' on your DbMigrationsConfiguration to allow application of automatic migrations even if they might cause data loss. Alternately, use Update-Database with the '-Force' option, or scaffold an explicit migration. ----------------------------------------------- At the time of the exception, the container was:
